comments.body:
Shouldn’t this return `Promise<awaited T>`?
```suggestion
    new <T>(executor: (resolve: (value?: T | PromiseLike<T> | awaited T) => void, reject: (reason?: any) => void) => void): Promise<awaited T>;
```
No, that would prevent it from being subclassable. The `T` in the constructor argument list must match the `T` in the return type.
